summary: Diff adds a new authenticated “Staying Safe & Out of Trouble” page with a new /staying-safe route and AppShell nav item, introduces a per-user CommitmentsPlan editor UI and corresponding backend persistence (including a migration), and expands the Disclaimers component with new legal/religious/no-guarantees sections. Some acceptance criteria cannot be fully verified from the truncated diff summary (notably where disclaimers are rendered, and whether grounding steps are present on the new page).

missing_requirements.requirement: The new disclaimer sections appear wherever the existing disclaimers component is rendered (e.g., Settings and Crisis/Help pages).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows Disclaimers.tsx updated with the required new sections, but does not show any evidence that Settings and/or CrisisHelp pages render the Disclaimers component (or that those pages were updated to include it). With only the provided diff summary, this cannot be confirmed.
evidence: frontend/src/App.tsx (routes include /settings and /crisis-help, but pages not shown rendering disclaimers)

missing_requirements.requirement: The “Staying Safe & Out of Trouble” page includes grounding steps.
missing_requirements.reason: The new page clearly includes a crisis-help button and a “Pause & Plan Checklist” section, but the provided snippet is truncated before showing any dedicated grounding-steps section. The diff summary text mentions grounding techniques, but the actual code evidence is truncated.
